attributes.action: why Isn’t there a law for parents who chose not to see their children?
attributes.additional_details:
Speaking from my own experience, my father left 2 of us when we were younger to start a new family, my mum was left single handed to do it alone.  
My friend has two teenage boys there father pays child maintenance but is to lazy to see them, how is that fair on the two boys and their mother! There are laws out there for parents who want to see their children, so why isn’t there a law for parents who choose not to?
attributes.background: Why should one parent have to do it all? And not get a break from bringing up their children. If parents separate then I truly believe that assess should legal. There are two many adults out there that are not seeing there children because they choose don’t want to.

rejection.details:
